summary: This mod replaces Frightened Woman appearance. She loos younger and has appachi hair. Requires appachi hair mod.
descriptionHtml:
Name: Appachified Frightened Woman
Version: 1.0
Date: 2017-08-18
Category: NPC Replacer
Requirements: [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/10168]ApachiiSkyHair_v_1_6_Full [/url]& [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/10168]ApachiiSkyHairFemale_v_1_5 [/url]
Recommended: Mod Organizer or Wrye Bash
Author(s): zelazko
Source: http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/86098/?
Forum: https://forums.nexusmods.com/index.php?showtopic=5913218

Description
===========

This is simple small NPC replacer mod. This mod replaces Frightened Woman appearance. She looks younger and has appachii hair. Requires both
ApachiiSkyHair_v_1_6_Full and ApachiiSkyHairFemale_v_1_5.



Install
=======

Mod Organizer
Just drop the archive into Mod Organizer\downloads and install from MO Downloads tab or download
straight from nexus into your MO. There are no custom options to choose
from during installation. Make sure you tick Appachified Frightened
Woman in Mod tab and activate the Appachified Frightened Woman.esp in
your plugin list.

Wrye Bash
Drop the archive into common\Skyrim Mods\Bash Installers. Open Wrye Bash and go into
Installers tab. Right click on Appachified Frightened Woman.zip and
choose install. Activate Appachified Frightened Woman.esp in the Mods
tab. If you rebuild your Bashed Patch you will be able to merge
Appachified Frightened Woman.esp with Bashed Patch. If you don't want to
rebuild you can use TES5Edit to copy override record from Appachified
Frightened Woman.esp into Bashed Patch.


Manually
Extract the archived and drop all files into your Data folder. Make sure you
activate Appachified Frightened Woman.esp with SkyrimLauncher or modding
utility of your choice.


Uninstall
=========
Mod Organizer/Wrye Bash:
Use your modding utility tool to uninstall by right clicking and choosing remove
mod/uninstall. If you rebuild Bashed Patch with Appachified Frightened
Woman.esp be sure to rebuild it again.


Manually
Remove these files from Data folder:

Appachified Frightened Woman.esp
meshes\actors\character\FaceGenData\FaceGeom\Skyrim.esm\000B1CFF.nif
textures\Actors\Character\FaceGenData\FaceTint\Skyrim.esm\000B1CFF.dds
textures\Actors\Character\FaceGenData\FaceTint\Skyrim.esm\000B1CFF.tga

Upgrade
=======
No upgrades planned for this small mod.



Compatibility
=============
This mod is incompatible with any mod that modifies Frightened Woman.
The only one that does that as far as I am aware is Women's faces by
veter75n http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/59133/?

Compatible with Bijin NPCs, Warmaidens, Wives, and BTRH Waifu.



Known Issues or Bugs
====================
No issues found.


History
=======
1.0, 2017/8/18 - Initial release.



Credits
=======
Thanks to apachii for letting me use ApachiiSkyHair resources.
Thanks to LHammonds for the Readme Generator this file was based on.



Tools Used
==========
Creation Kit
Readme Generator - http://HammondsLegacy.com/obmm/tools_readme_generator1.asp

Licensing/Legal
===============
You can do whatever you want with this mod but don't complain to me if it
doesn't work or your PC blows up.
author: zelazko
